title: PBE in Oceania!!!!?????
body:
I am a level 30 Oceania player who is really interested by the idea of testing the beta of new characters/ideas that goes into League of Legends. I have put $100 plus into the game and I want to support it's growth as I think the developers are awesome and the game itself if really fun. I have invited many friends to play the game and I have been playing for a while too.
PBE seems really cool and I want to try it out and test new things. Please Riot, allow Oceania-ians to go on the PBE and test!
Thanks, BrodeRage

replies.body: I really want pbe on oceania, because its a bit unfair if the other countries get it but us.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

Its so unfair.
rito should check out {{summoner:2}} this forum out.
Idk why Riot didn't think about Oceania. NA is not really different and other servers should deserve and be able to play the PBE version. Please Riot?
Why is there a pbe server in na and not one in oce?? Isn't that just unfair of them to do it??
i really want PBE on ocenia

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy

Try the Misc. boards if you want a red to see it.

Currently PBE is not open to any region but I assume that the direction Riot would like to take PBE is to have a solid base of testers who have "testing" experience. PBE is where most of the bugs are caught and as such you need to understand how to format a bug that a developer could take back to his desk and  pinpoint the line or block of code that causes it.

This was one of the main reasons open PBE was closed.
